name: Panic On The Deck
description:
Welcome to Panic on The Deck, a 3DBLOB game, that en-captures a psychological thriller built for PC and Mobile, which learns who you are, as you play. 

Adventure your way through a terrifying tale of suspense, filled with hard choices and featuring custom artwork and voice acted narration.

Built on top of Unity, using Fungus, our game uses its evolving narrative to take you on a psychological deep dive, and expose your true personality to yourself.

Feel free to play our tech demo, and expect more in the future!

In the meantime, help us out with a donation, if you like it, and keep yourself updated by visiting us online, on social media, and our own website!

Roles: -  Alexandru March( Artist and Developer )

                - Andrei Tautu (Programmer)

                -  Codrut Chis (Writer)

               -  Alex Chiriac (Voice Actor)

               - Seian Scorobete(Sound Artist)
